member.name: M:D4EM.Data.Source.BASINS.GetMetStations(D4EM.Data.Project,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Get BASINS Meterologic stations and/or data
member.param: Input: If aStationIDs contains values, only those stations will be checked for being in the region, If aStationIDs is Nothing or .Count = 0, then all stations will be searched for ones in the region Output: Station IDs found in project region
True to create a point shapefile of met stations
If creating shapefile, can optionally provide full path of file to create. If not set, defaults to aProject.ProjectFolder / met / met.shp

member.name: M:D4EM.Data.Source.BASINS.GetMetData(D4EM.Data.Project,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Get BASINS Meterologic data for the given stations
member.param: Station ID numbers to get data from
Save met data in this WDM file

member.name: M:D4EM.Data.Source.BASINS.GetBASINSSTATSGO(D4EM.Data.Project)
member.summary: Retrieve and self-extract STATSGO data for each state in the region
member.remarks: First checks for states in BASINS layer st.shp in project folder. If not found, looks for national st.shp and computes states overlapping project region.\ TODO: use Region to determine states

member.name: M:D4EM.Data.Source.BASINS.GetBASINS(D4EM.Data.Project,System.String,System.String,D4EM.Data.LayerSpecification)
member.param: Sub-folder within project folder (e.g. "BASINSData") or full path of folder to save in (e.g. "C:\BASINSData"). If nothing or empty string, will save in aProject.ProjectFolder (plus data type subfolder for most types)
Type of data to download. Valid values are in BASINS.LayerSpecifications.

member.name: P:D4EM.Data.Source.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:D4EM.Data.Source.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:D4EM.Data.Source.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
